word:
Oh what covetous, selfish, short-sighted creatures human beings are. Distrust your own judgment, and depend on the judgment of God. Distinguish between what is pleasing and what is profitable. Do God's will submissively. . . . Following your own way and your own will, you will find thorns and thistles.--Letter 4, 1901, pp. 3, 4, 5. (To Grant Roysten, January 8, 1901.) 

Released August, 1967.
